org.mini2Dx.core.graphics.pipeline

Interface RenderOperation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BeginFrameBufferOperation, EndFrameBufferOperation, RenderFrameBufferOperation, ScaleOperation, ShaderProgramOperation, TintOperation, TranslateOperation

    public interface RenderOperation
    A rendering operation that can be applied to Graphics and optionally unapplied
